metadata.description: A desolate expanse of ash and bone, where the once-thriving city of Erebo was reduced to rubble by an ancient cataclysm. The air is thick with toxic fumes, and the ground is slick with a noxious oil that seeps from the earth.
metadata.significance: Birthplace of the world's most powerful magic, which now lies dormant and waiting to be reawakened.
